Covercraft: Hey there, this is Sarah. Thanks for checking us out! üòä https://covercraft.attn.tv/ap2ldH37G7sO

Covercraft: Just to be sure, are you referring to a Seat Cover? If so, the closest one that we have with cotton material on the website is the Polycotton SeatSaver Custom Seat Covers and you may check it here: https://covercraft.attn.tv/ariuzVoSvWYo

templates: For custom full vehicle covers use FVC shortcut

If we don't have a pattern/color the cx is looking for use PRR shortcut
dos_and_don_ts: Do not tell customers that the base price is the final price! The cost changes by the fitment and depends on the vehicle
Rebates are discounts for this brand!
Custom dim pattern sheets are only available for Vehicle Covers (Car, Truck, Van,RV)

conversation.message_text: Blenders: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from Blenders Eyewear
Blenders: Welcome to Blenders! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

Blenders: Get Blended! Your welcome code is WELCOME-n4hdtB. Shop now and automatically apply 15% off your order: https://blenderseyewear.attn.tv/afM6_kfRDWlT .

Reply back anytime for help!
Blenders: Plus save our contact to receive exclusive updates!
Help
Blenders: I would be more than happy to help out, ask away!

I'm buying a pair of glasses I have a gift card and I have the 15% off you gave me but the price is not correct on the initial price of the glasses they were on sale for 2990 they're marked at 2999 and then I'm trying to be charged 59+ my $30 discount makes it down to not much at all I got a $30 gift card from Nift and IFT and your 15% off and they're trying to charge me $31 that's not even right the initial price was less than that they're charging me $30 more than the initial price from the beginning
Blenders: I'm sorry to hear that. Could you kindly share a screenshot of the items in your cart? I'll be happy to look into the issue!
Hrllog

You can see it's 2999 and it doesn't state that on the first photo the price is that's not even it's not right it's there's they're not even taking the $30 off for my Nift gift which I was given $30 and then you guys gave me 15 so it should be free and chipping free
Blenders: Thank you for sending that over! Could you also provide a screenshot of the item(s) in your cart so I can take a closer look and assist you further?
The second photo is from my cart

Blenders: Thank you for getting back to me and providing that information! Unfortunately, you won't be able to use multiple deals at checkout, but feel free to use the one that gives you the best value! We offer free shipping on domestic orders over $50. Maybe you can add something else to reach the minimum?

I would if I had any money but I'm homeless and jobless and I'm just disabled and was given a gift I guess it's not a gift anymore set a qualified for free shipping right there on that piece of paper or on my cart everything said I qualified for free shipping why doesn't it also not qualify for shipping and they still haven't taken my $30 gift card off

Blenders: I totally understand where you're coming from. May I know what item you are trying to purchase? Based on your screenshot, I can see that your $30 gift card was successfully applied to your cart. 

If the item is currently on sale for $29.99, then it is possible that the item went back to its original price after you applied the gift card since discount codes and gift cards don't apply to sale items. I hope this clarifies it.
Yes it's I think discounted or not discounted discontinued sage cruisers

Blenders: Thanks for letting me know! I just checked and it looks like the Sage Cruisers are back to their original price, $59. Also, upon checking the screenshot that had been sent, since you've already used a code that takes $30 off, another discount can't be applied. You can only use one deal per checkout, so feel free to choose the one that gives you the best value.

Please let me know how I can assist you further today, I'm just a text away!

templates: When closing the conversation use CC shortcut
For all inqiuries about refunds/replacement orders use RRO shortcut
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Discount codes or rewards points can be used with a gift card
Discount codes and rewards points can not be used together
Discount codes can not be used on sale items

Nectar: Thanks for reaching out, and I'm sorry to hear about this. The best way to handle this is to email us at support@nectarsleep.com or give us a call at +1 (888) 863-2827. Our sleep specialists are available 24/7, and they'll be more than happy to help!

send_to_cs: No ESC for this client, send everything to CS
Send to CS for refund inquiries
tone: Close the convo once the client takes over
Close the convo if the cx first message is ok, no, etc.
Don't use the word "off" when talking about promotions
dos_and_don_ts: Don't proactively offer to find pricing info, redirect them to the website instead
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Do not offer a coupon to first time purchasers/subscribers. There is not an active discount code at this time. Use DCI shortcut
